notes:
ChatVideoPro V3.0.2 focuses on professional-grade upscaling, personalized copywriting tools, and refined creative workflows.

Topaz AI Integration: Replaced legacy upscalers with industry-leading Topaz technology for superior image and video enhancement.

Timeline Upscaling: Expanded Video-to-Video upscaling to work on any clip from your Premiere Pro timeline.

Brand Voice Assistant: New ability to train a custom brand voice and generate SEO-optimized platform copy via the /copy command.

Thumbnail Mode: Dedicated high-CTR generation support added to GPT Image 1.5 and Flux 2 Max models.

Workflow Logic: Faster editing via Story Cutter auto-play and increased accuracy for prompt-based Color Grading.

Performance & Fixes: Significant stability updates to the Canvas Editor, SAM 3 framerates, and real-time loading indicators.
